message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I am still unable to go above $120 for the product. Would it be possible for you to lower the price further?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're still not willing to meet me at $135, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so I hope you'll consider it.
